title: 820-2610 fireball capactiors and power issues
message:
Hi.

This machine has no signs of liquid damage at all.
C6612 was mostly ash and bare metal with a dark blast radius on the PCB.

Was no power, replaced C6612 and it now powers but will power off abruptly most of the time.
Also ISL6259 seems to warm a little, not hot just warm, when MagSafe is plugged in so I'll start looking around there.

Still powers abruptly powers off without charger plugged in.

Any likely causes or rails to start testing please?

title: 820-2610 fireball capactiors and power issues
message: C7771 issue. Does it shut down on AC power too?

title: 820-2610 fireball capactiors and power issues
message:
[QUOTE="dukefawks, post: 9850"]C7771 issue. Does it shut down on AC power too? [/QUOTE]

Yep surely does.
